shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: AHL: Belleville outduels Penguins in overtime
shorts.title_distilled: AHL: Belleville outduels Penguins in overtime.
shorts.description: Belleville’s Lassi Thomson scored at 1:34 of overtime to defeat the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins, 3-2, on Wednesday night at Mohegan Arena. Thomson’s game-winner was his 11th goal of the season and came off assists from Xavier Bourgault and Wyatt Gongiovanni. Bourgalt gave the Senators a 1-0 lead at 17:24 when he scored an unassisted goal. It was his 14th of the season and the only goal of the period. The Penguins answered when Rafael Harvey-Pinard scored his 10th of the season at 10:22 of the second period. Avery Hays and David Breazeale were credited with the assists. In the third period, […]
shorts.content: Belleville’s Lassi Thomson scored at 1:34 of overtime to defeat the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins, 3-2, on Wednesday night at Mohegan Arena. Thomson’s game-winner was his 11th goal of the season and came off assists from Xavier Bourgault and Wyatt Gongiovanni. Bourgalt gave the Senators a 1-0 lead at 17:24 when he scored an unassisted goal. It was his 14th of the season and the only goal of the period. The Penguins answered when Rafael Harvey-Pinard scored his 10th of the season at 10:22 of the second period. Avery Hays and David Breazeale were credited with the assists. In the third period, […]
shorts.content_distilled: Belleville’s Lassi Thomson scored at 1:34 of overtime to defeat the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins, 3-2, on Wednesday night at Mohegan Arena.

shorts.title: Finding the right elements: Elements Café lands in Childs
shorts.title_distilled: Finding the right elements: Elements Café lands in Childs.
shorts.description: For many who enjoy a morning coffee and conversation with their community, it’s no surprise the former City Line in Carbondale was a happening spot. Seeking to expand, owners and operators Nicole and Jack Curtis opened Elements Café at 510 Main St. in Childs.

shorts.content: 'If rights are eroded for one group, as they are being now, they can be eroded for all,' says Commissioner Bill Gaughan

shorts.title: RailRiders seek game day staff at PNC Field job fair in Lackawanna County
shorts.title_distilled: RailRiders seek game day staff at PNC Field job fair in Lackawanna County.
shorts.description: The Scranton Wilkes-Barre RailRiders are hosting job fairs at PNC Field to fill game day roles like bat boys and ushers, offering perks and on-the-spot interviews.

shorts.title: Scranton bar, hotel demolished after fire
shorts.title_distilled: Scranton bar, hotel demolished after fire.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A Scranton hotel and bar have been demolished after an early December fire. Crews tore down the West Side Hotel and Kilcoyne's earlier Wednesday. An excavator could be seen cleaning up debris in the now-empty lot. The fire broke out in the early hours of December 10. Several residents had [...]
